attributes.action: Allow and regulate the sale of Horsemeat in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
There is nothing wrong with Horsemeat, so why is it not knowingly sold in the UK.

The Horsemeat scandal is simply down to the fact you "aren't getting what you're paying for," not that it can kill and harm.

Other countries use it, it tastes nice, regulate it like beef etc., people will probably buy it.
